hero.title: Oracle Executive Protection
hero.subtitle: See the invisible and do the impossible
hero.description: Founded on experience, driven by innovation: we protect your world with discretion and professionalism, wherever you are.

split_section.title: Travel Risk Management
split_section.description:
Oracle Executive Protection represents one of the most important international realities in Travel Risk Management.

We offer an excellent service, highly personalized to ensure that every trip you take (business or vacation), anywhere in the world, is safe, smooth, worry-free.

items.title: Preventive Security:
items.description: Through meticulous Risk Assessment we analyze risks with a personalized approach, mitigating vulnerabilities by implementing the specific measures necessary before identified risks become reality.

items.title: Proactive Security:
items.description: We act to anticipate and manage risks before they manifest. We build resilience based on profiling and experience, in order to anticipate and avoid every possible risk.

items.title: Predictive Security:
items.description: We use analysis based on advanced technologies and intelligence sources. Our Risk Analysts cross-reference AI information, OSINT, closint, map site Risk and deep web to study possible scenarios, anticipate emerging threats and predict potential risks before they occur.

items.title: Deep Security:
items.description: Multi-level security approach to manage every client, their reputation, their assets and proxies by combining physical, IT, organizational security and through constant training. We create a system resilient even to the most complex threats.

separator_banner.title: 30+ years of excellence in global security
separator_banner.subtitle: Your security is our mission

split_section_reversed.title: VIP Events and Executive Protection
split_section_reversed.description: We guarantee maximum discretion and security for exclusive events and high-profile executive protection. From planning to execution, every detail is handled with millimetric precision.

strategic_protection_section.title: Strategic Protection Against Global Threats
strategic_protection_section.description: Advanced Anti-terrorism and Anti-crime security solutions for institutions, companies, corporations, public and private infrastructures and sensitive sites, designed to prevent, protect and respond to threats, complying with the highest international standards

luxury_security_section.title: Luxury Hotel Security Management and Private Residences
luxury_security_section.description:
We protect luxury hotels and private residences through comprehensive vulnerability analysis and implementation of cutting-edge security systems.

We transform security into a strength for your facility, ensuring discreet and high-level protection for VIP clients, staff and corporate reputation.

about.title: Who we are
about.description:
Oracle Executive Protection is a leading company in consulting, analysis and training specialized in the security, defense and physical and technological protection sector.

With over 30 years of experience in the sector, we stand out for the excellence of our services and the innovative approach to risk management.

contact.title: Need a consultation?
contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to assess your specific needs and offer you tailored security solutions.

home_section.title: Global Security Excellence
home_section.description:
Founded on experience, driven by innovation: we protect your world with discretion and professionalism, wherever you are.

Oracle Executive Protection is a global leader in elite security: a company specialized in Security Management and Executive Protection.

Oracle Executive Protection is one of the first global security agencies in Europe to deal with Travel Risk Management, becoming an absolute leader in the sector also thanks to its prestigious international partnerships and collaborations.

agency.title: Global Security Agency
agency.description:
A company specialized in Security Management and Executive Protection.

Oracle is one of the first global security agencies in Europe to deal with Travel Risk Management, becoming an absolute leader in the sector also thanks to its prestigious international partnerships and collaborations.

experience.title: Over 30 Years of Experience
experience.description:
A know-how of over 30 years of experience thanks to our team in Security Management, global security operations, Intelligence, Risk Analysis.

Specialized in executive protection of institutional subjects, infrastructures, sensitive sites, multinational companies, luxury hotels, VIP events and private residences.

pillars.title: The 4 pillars of our philosophy
pillars.subtitle: Our methodology is based on four fundamental principles that guide our every action

items.title: Strategic Vision
items.description: We anticipate threats through in-depth context analysis and long-term strategic planning.

items.title: Integrated Protection
items.description: We combine physical, technological and intelligence security to create a complete and resilient protection system.

items.title: Operational Excellence
items.description: We maintain the highest operational standards through continuous training and use of the most advanced technologies.

items.title: Personalized Approach
items.description: Each client receives tailored solutions, developed based on specific needs and individual risk profile.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description:
Our mission is to ensure customer security with discretion, innovation and a personalized functional approach.

We operate by combining the expertise of former law enforcement officials, former military, Risk Analysts, and Private Security Operators with Global experience in Executive Protection and Security Management.

standards.title: International Standards
standards.description: We follow the highest international standards such as ISO 31030 and 31000, with a discreet and highly effective approach using the most advanced technology and methodologies.

cta.title: Ready to enhance your security?
cta.description: Contact us for a personalized consultation

professionals.title: Security Professionals
professionals.description:
Oracle Executive Protection is composed of experienced professionals in the key roles of the "Security System": Security Manager, Risk Analyst, Protective Security Specialist, Travel Risk Manager, Anti-terrorism Analysts, Logistics Coordinators.

Meticulously selected with excellence background and exclusive reliability.

leadership.title: Operational Leadership
leadership.description:
An operational leadership that ensures rapid and effective solutions in the field, risk and anti-terrorism analysts.

For years we have taken care of the security and protection of people and families, companies, sensitive sites, critical infrastructures, borders, states, perimeters that had to be impregnable, places of worship training some of the best professionals in Security Management, Close Protection and modern Anti-terrorism.

hero.title: Luxury Hotel Security Management
hero.subtitle: We transform your Hotel into an environment where the security and protection of your clients, your staff and your reputation become a strength and attraction for VIP clientele, leaving unchanged the class, elegance and discretion due to your architecture and the luxury world.

hotelSecurity.title: Security Management for Luxury Hotels
hotelSecurity.description:
Through an in-depth Risk Assessment we evaluate all physical, structural and technological vulnerabilities of your Hotel, risks for guests, external and internal threats aimed at ruining your Hotel's reputation and the safety of clients and staff in line with the most important international standards such as UNI ISO 31000, UNI ISO 31030 and Hospitality Security Guidelines.

From active and passive physical security to cybersecurity we make your structure more resilient and safer. We design customized security protocols and assets and train your staff with certified courses to be ready to respond to any emergency with determination, legal security and experience.

items.title: Risk Assessment
items.description: Complete evaluation of physical, structural and technological vulnerabilities

items.title: Travel Risk Management
items.description: Risk management for VIP guests and prestigious clients

items.title: Staff Training
items.description: Certified courses to prepare staff for emergencies

items.title: Cybersecurity
items.description: Complete protection of IT systems and guest data

privateResidences.title: Private Residences
privateResidences.quote: There will never be anything more important than the safety of those you love.
privateResidences.description:
Make your nest the truly safe place for your family.

Our team of professionals will assess the structural vulnerabilities of your residence, environmental risks, external threats and the current state of your active and passive defensive systems.

We design your new anti-intrusion system in your home and personalized security protocols, including the most modern security, protection and emergency management technologies. We will deliver written protocols and personalized assets.

We bring you, through our consolidated field experience, the most important thing of all, our added value to everything you could find on the market today: Our professionals will work with the family on specific technical training on security protocols to be implemented.

Write to us and request our concierge services and GPG art 133 training.

teamRecruitment.title: Join the Team
teamRecruitment.description: Contact us to participate in our training courses to join the Oracle - EP Team as Risk Analysts and Mitigators in the roles of Security Officer, Protection Security Specialist, Travel Risk Officer or our technical roles.

cta.title: Protect your luxury facility
cta.description: Contact us for a personalized assessment of your security needs for luxury hotels or private residences.
